channel.title: Several things I need help with
channel.description:
I was told to post them all here by a mod, sooooo.... thanks for reading here they are
- I've took the time to port forward, and i have no-ip, how do i make my server use the ip that i made? so ppl can connect??? is there a code i put in a folder in my server or what??

item.title: Several things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

http://www.portforward.com and find your router.

Read full topic

item.title: Several things I need help with
item.dc:creator: @lemons_burn lemons burn
item.description:
@lemons_burn wrote:

Lol idk if your a noob or what, you don’t need a code, but i dont know if you port fowarded wrong or have a suck ass router that doesnt work at all with pf, eatheir you unlucky like me or you dont know how to! download utorrent you;ll get lucky if works works for some and some not gl with your server

-nate
